channel.title: Can't access the console
channel.description: I want to access the console, but I can't. I can in other source games (HL2, and episodes) but not in BM for some reason. I checked the keybinding, and I was pressing the right key (`), and even when I changed the binding to other things (x, c, enter) it still wouldn't work. Any suggestions?

item.title: Can't access the console
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
add the following to autoexec.cfg inside the bms/cfg directory

con_enable 1
bind “/” “toggleconsole”

does pressing / bring up the console?
